speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0450/2006 ) by Mrs Ries, on behalf of the Committee on the Environment, Public Health and Food Safety, on promoting healthy diets and physical activity: a European dimension for the prevention of overweight, obesity and chronic diseases ( 2006/2231(INI) ).
